maya/beastmayaplugin/src/mayanodes/beastentitynode.cpp
/*

#include "mayanodes/beastentitynode.h"
#include "mayanodes/nodeids.h"

#include <maya/MFnCompoundAttribute.h>
#include <maya/MFnNumericAttribute.h>
#include <maya/MFnMessageAttribute.h>
#include <maya/MFnStringData.h>
#include <maya/MFnTypedAttribute.h>
#include <maya/MGlobal.h>
#include <maya/MFnDependencyNode.h>

#include "beastutils.h"
#include "mayautils.h"

namespace beastmaya {

MTypeId BeastEntityNode::id(ADSK_BEAST_ENTITY);

MObject BeastEntityNode::instance;
MObject BeastEntityNode::target;
MObject BeastEntityNode::fromInstance;
MObject BeastEntityNode::autoTextureResolution;
MObject BeastEntityNode::texelScale;
MObject BeastEntityNode::textureResolution;
MObject BeastEntityNode::outAtlasScale;
MObject BeastEntityNode::outAtlasOffset;
MObject BeastEntityNode::pass;
MObject BeastEntityNode::textureFileName;
MObject BeastEntityNode::textureResults;
MObject BeastEntityNode::bakeUVSet;

BeastEntityNode::BeastEntityNode() {
}

BeastEntityNode::~BeastEntityNode() {
        for(auto i = begin(m_ids); i != end(m_ids); ++i) {
                MMessage::removeCallback(*i);
        }
}

void BeastEntityNode::postConstructor()
{
        setExistWithoutInConnections(false);
        setExistWithoutOutConnections(false);

        MStatus res;
        m_ids.push_back(MNodeMessage::addAttributeChangedCallback(thisMObject(), attributeChangedCallback, this, &res));
        CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
}

void* BeastEntityNode::creator() {
        return new BeastEntityNode();
}

MStatus BeastEntityNode::initialize()
        //
        //      Description:
        //              This method is called to create and initialize all of the attributes
        //      and attribute dependencies for this node type.  This is only called 
        //              once when the node type is registered with Maya.
        //
        //      Return Values:
        //              MS::kSuccess
        //              MS::kFailure
        //
{
        MStatus stat;

        // Attribute types
        MFnMessageAttribute nMsgAttr;
        MFnNumericAttribute nNumAttr;
        MFnTypedAttribute  nTypedAttr;
        MFnStringData strData;

        instance = nMsgAttr.create("instance", "i");
        stat = addAttribute(instance);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        target = nTypedAttr.create("target", "t", MFnData::kString, strData.create(""));
        stat = addAttribute(target);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        fromInstance = nNumAttr.create("fromInstance", "fi", MFnNumericData::kBoolean, true);
        stat = addAttribute(fromInstance);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        autoTextureResolution = nNumAttr.create("autoTextureResolution", "atr", MFnNumericData::kBoolean, true);
        stat = addAttribute(autoTextureResolution);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        texelScale = nNumAttr.create("texelScale", "ts", MFnNumericData::kFloat, 1.0f);
        nNumAttr.setMin(0.0f);
        nNumAttr.setSoftMin(0.0f); nNumAttr.setSoftMax(128.0f);
        stat = addAttribute(texelScale);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        textureResolution = nNumAttr.create("textureResolution", "tr", MFnNumericData::k2Int);
        nNumAttr.setDefault(128, 128);
        nNumAttr.setMin(1, 1);
        stat = addAttribute(textureResolution);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        outAtlasScale = nNumAttr.create("outAtlasScale", "oas", MFnNumericData::k2Float);
        nNumAttr.setDefault(1.0f, 1.0f);
        stat = addAttribute(outAtlasScale);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        outAtlasOffset = nNumAttr.create("outAtlasOffset", "oaf", MFnNumericData::k2Float);
        nNumAttr.setDefault(0.0f, 0.0f);
        stat = addAttribute(outAtlasOffset);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        
        // Compound for texture results
        pass = nTypedAttr.create("pass", "p", MFnData::kString, strData.create(""));
        stat = addAttribute(pass);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);
        
        textureFileName = nTypedAttr.create("textureFileName", "tfn", MFnData::kString, strData.create(""));
        stat = addAttribute(textureFileName);
        nTypedAttr.setArray(true);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        bakeUVSet = nTypedAttr.create("bakeUVSet", "buv", MFnData::kString, strData.create(""));
        stat = addAttribute(bakeUVSet);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);


        MFnCompoundAttribute cmpAttr; 

        textureResults = cmpAttr.create("textureResults", "trs");
        cmpAttr.setArray(true);
        cmpAttr.addChild(pass);
        cmpAttr.addChild(textureFileName);
        stat = addAttribute(textureResults);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        return MS::kSuccess;
}

MStatus BeastEntityNode::compute(const MPlug& plug, MDataBlock& data) {
        return MS::kSuccess;
}

void BeastEntityNode::attributeChangedCallback(MNodeMessage::AttributeMessage msg, MPlug& plug1, MPlug& plug2, void* clientData) {
        MStatus res;
        BeastEntityNode* me = reinterpret_cast<BeastEntityNode*>(clientData);

        MFnDependencyNode node(me->thisMObject(), &res);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_VOID(res);

        std::wstring plugName = getPlugName(plug1);
        if (msg & MNodeMessage::kAttributeSet) {
                if(plugName == L"autoTextureResolution") {
                        bool autoTextureResolution = true;
                        getPlugValue(node, L"autoTextureResolution", autoTextureResolution);
                        if (!autoTextureResolution) {
                                int textureResolution = getAutoTextureResolution(node);
                                int2 t = {textureResolution, textureResolution};
                                setCompoundPlugValue(node, L"textureResolution", t);
                        }
                }
        }
}

}
